name: A Not-So Pong
description:
Inviting you into a nostalgic night with the legendary classic arcade game adaptation that started it all - A Not-So Pong! Simple, yet addictive gameplay, will transport you back to the early days of video gaming.

Challenge your friends to a virtual table tennis game and show off your skills with lightning-fast reflexes and precise timing. But, that's not the only thing. Use your creativity to attack your enemies, block them with anything - literally anything, you can move the scores, boards, all of the objects - and win the game with every trick you can think of.

Whether you're a seasoned gamer or just looking for some nostalgic fun, this game is for everyone. Call a friend, fire up the game, and get ready for a night full of tricks and fun.

How To PlaySingleplayer - Fight against the computer, move surrounding objects to your advantage by reflecting the ball against it, and score to 10 as fast as possible to win!

Multiplayer - Same rule, same gameplay, but ten times the fun with your friends! Battle your friends in this fast-paced sports game!
